title: Honey Social Network
desc: A mock social network where users can login or register, upload a profile picture, and add and delete friends.

title: Protect public lands petition
desc: A full stack application that allows users to register and login, sign a canvas petition and edit their profile. Built during SPICED Academy, an immersive JavaScript-based web development course.

title: U-Bahn typography image board
desc: A mock-Instagram full stack, single page application for uploading photos of typography along Berlin's U-Bahn. Commenting is also supported. Built with Angular.js.
tech: Angular.js, Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL, AWS S3

title: Your Spotify listening habits
desc: An interactive visualization of your Spotify listening habits. Built with: D3.js, JQuery, Express and Handlebars.
tech: D3.js, Britecharts, Handlebars.js, Express.js, Spotify API

title: Infographics: Missoula to Berlin
desc: Travelled to Berlin, Germany with the University of Montana School of Journalism in 2016 to produce a series of journalism pieces on the wave of refugee migration in Europe. Reported and designed infographics for Burying the Dead, a story examining death and the refugee crisis. Used data from the Migrant Files. Also designed and produced the website for the project, at missoulatoberlin.com
alt: Infographic: As European borders close, migrant death counts rise
alt3: Infographic: 63% of refugees that died on the way to Europe died from drowning.

title: Colorado executive pay infographics
desc: Oil and gas company executives topped the list of Colorado's highest paid executives in 2016. These infographics accompanied a Denver Post story examining the 2016 data.

title: Missoula to Berlin website
desc: Designed the website for Missoula to Berlin, a University of Montana Journalism School project reporting on the refugee crisis in Berlin.
alt2: Missoula to Berlin homepage stories section

title: Center for Children, Families and Workforce Development web design
desc: Web design (using Cascade CMS), infographics and graphic design for a social work center at the University of Montana.
tech: Cascade CMS, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, HTML/CSS
alt: CCFWD infographic of children and familes in Montana

title: U.S. Forest Service wood stake insertions map
desc: Used ARC GIS and data analysis in Excel to design a USFS map for an Advanced Cartographic Design GIS capstone project
alt: Map of U.S forest Service wood stake insertions worldwide

title: Denali National Park map
desc: Designed all layers of a map of Denali for an Advanced Cartographic Design GIS class

title: The Meth Effect
desc: Co-built and designed the website for The Montana Meth Effect, a University of Montana Journalism School project uncovering the effects of methamphetamine in Montana.
pub: University of Montana School of Journalism

title: Zentz Accessible Design branding and web design
desc: Web design and branding for Zentz Accessible Design, an accessibility consultant firm.

title: UM's $1.8 million deficit
desc: Tableau infographic examining how 30% of funds were removed from accounts to fix UM's $1.8 milllion deficit.

title: The faces of Medicaid in Colorado
desc: Medicaid in Colorado provides coverage for more than 1.3 million people, about one out of every five people in the state. This infographic breaks down who is covered by Medicaid in Colorado. Made a responsive HTML version for web and a static package for print.
alt2: Infographic in the Denver Post print edition

title: Colorado's construciton crisis infographics
desc: Map of Colorado's projected population growth and print infographics to accompany a story on Colorado's upcoming construction worker shortage.

title: Josh Allen infographic
desc: Infographic of Quarterback Josh Allen's stats.

title: Infographic: Rockies on the road
desc: The Colorado Rockies 2017 on the road statistics

title: Infographic: The Great American Solar Eclipse
desc: The path of the 2017 solar eclipse.
alt: map and infographic of the eclipse path of 2017
alt2: print edition in the Denver Post

title: Nuggets NBA draft selection's first seasons
desc: The Nuggets NBA draft selections' first seasons

title: Denver Sheriff Overtime
desc: Responsive web graphic for web (resize browser to view responsivness) and graphic for print.

title: Montana Kaimin cover designs
desc: Art direction, print design and graphic design for various Montana Kaimin cover stories and spreads.

title: Montana Breweries
desc: Used Leaflet.js, HTML and CSS to map breweries in Montana and county populations. Based off a NICAR 2016 presentation by Chris Essig.
